alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 09 at 2:28PM CDT until June 10 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... Arkansas River at Ozark Lock and Dam affecting Logan, Franklin and Johnson Counties. Arkansas River at Van Buren affecting Sebastian and Crawford Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River at Van Buren. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, minor lowland flooding occurs along the shoreline from the I-540 bridge east towards Lavaca. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 23.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight. However... rainfall late tonight and tomorrow morning will cause a second rise to just below flood stage late Friday or Saturday. If the rainfall is heavier than forecast... the flood warning might need to be extended. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
